document.full_text: we like to think of medicine as a rational science, and that our attention to our lives and our bodies pays off in reasonably predictable ways. but our health and well-being is much more bound to random chance than we'd like to think.
document.title: our health and the luck of the draw
lines_and_colors: we like to think of medicine as a rational science, and that our attention to our lives and our bodies pays off in reasonably predictable ways. but our health and well-being is much more bound to random chance than we'd like to think.
